cells.data:
• golang webapp using https://github.com/gin-gonic/gin
  • Inside a docker container
  • Either mysql or SQLite (look at docker volumes for this)
  • Use sessions to keep track of people.
  • No logins or emails needed.
http://slides.com/akshaydeo/writing-web-apps-in-golang looks like a useful high-level view of golang web apps
